definitions.definition: Of behavior , showing inadequate or counterproductive mental and behavioral adaptation to a new situation.
Of anatomy , physiology , or behavior , showing inadequate or counterproductive evolutionary adaptation to an environment or its changes.

main_definition: ( psychology ) Of behavior , showing inadequate or counterproductive mental and behavioral adaptation to a new situation.
secondary_definitions: ( evolutionary theory ) Of anatomy , physiology , or behavior , showing inadequate or counterproductive evolutionary adaptation to an environment or its changes.
